description: Herb quinoa with cucumber, tomato, olives, and lemon tahini dressing alongside lemon-herb cucumber salad.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Herb quinoa with cucumber, tomato, olives, and lemon tahini dressing alongside lemon-herb cucumber salad.. Scene: mediterranean-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: A captivating close-up of a Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl. Fluffy herb quinoa forms a base, generously topped with glistening cherry tomatoes, crisp cucumber, briny olives, and chickpeas. A rich lemon tahini dressing cascades over, with a vibrant lemon-herb cucumber salad nestled beside. Bathed in warm, soft natural light, whisps of steam rise gently. Garnish with fresh mint, parsley, and a lemon wedge. Eye-level perspective, shallow depth of field.
